summary: All list indentation issues have been resolved. Lists now have proper 1.5em (18.375px) left margin indentation.

changes: Added base ul/ol styles with margin-left: 1.5em
Added base li styles with proper spacing
Added nested list support with consistent indentation
Updated .post__content ul/ol to use 1.5em instead of 20px for consistency
Updated .glossary-content ul/ol to use 1.5em instead of 20px for consistency
Added nested list support to both contexts

css_rules_added.base_styles: ul, ol { margin-left: 1.5em; margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm); padding-left: 0; list-style-position: outside; }
css_rules_added.nested_lists: ul ul, ol ol, ul ol, ol ul { margin-top: var(--spacing-xs); margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs); margin-left: 1.5em; }
